144 pages
Publisher: Gibbs Smith (September 1, 2009)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1423606523
ASIN: B0071UNKWW

Soup is a deliciously easy way to provide for a neighborhood potluck or a comfortable night at home with the family. 100 Soups for $5 or Less includes recipes for Armchair Quarterback Chili, Stir-Fry Noodle Soup, and many more-each recipe prepared for $5 or less!

This cookbook also shows calorie counts per serving and teaches how to be wise with money, shop in season, and plan menus ahead of time to make every penny count.

Try these delicious recipes:

Tortilla Chicken Soup

Stir Fry Noodle Soup

Creamy Harvest Apple Slush

Armchair Quarterback Chili

Gayle Pierce has been gathering and testing soup recipes on family and friends for more than 20 years. She resides in Liberty, Indiana.

Comforting soups for penny-pinching families, includes calorie counts
